snippet: Memoranda and orders filed by Judge Shira A. Scheindlin following the trial over New York Police Department’s stop-and-frisk tactics.
lead_paragraph: Memoranda and orders filed by Judge Shira A. Scheindlin following the trial over New York Police Department’s stop-and-frisk tactics.

headline.main: On the Stop-and-Frisk Decision: Floyd v. City of New York
